Uses of Class
com.azure.core.amqp.RetryOptions

  • Packages that use RetryOptions 
    Package Description
    com.azure.core.amqp
    Package containing classes common to AMQP protocol.
    com.azure.messaging.eventhubs
    Package containing classes for creating an EventHubClient or an EventHubAsyncClient to perform operations on Azure Event Hubs.
    com.azure.messaging.eventhubs.models
    Package containing classes used for creating and configuring events that are being sent-to and received-from Azure Event Hubs service.

    • Uses of RetryOptions in com.azure.core.amqp

      Methods in com.azure.core.amqp that return RetryOptions 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RetryOptions RetryOptions.clone()
      Creates a new copy of the current instance, cloning its attributes into a new instance.
      protected RetryOptions RetryPolicy.getRetryOptions()
      Gets the set of options used to configure this retry policy.
      RetryOptions RetryOptions.setDelay(Duration delay)
      Gets the delay between retry attempts for a fixed approach or the delay on which to base calculations for a backoff-approach.
      RetryOptions RetryOptions.setMaxDelay(Duration maximumDelay)
      Sets the maximum permissible delay between retry attempts.
      RetryOptions RetryOptions.setMaxRetries(int numberOfRetries)
      Sets the maximum number of retry attempts before considering the associated operation to have failed.
      RetryOptions RetryOptions.setRetryMode(RetryMode retryMode)
      Sets the approach to use for calculating retry delays.
      RetryOptions RetryOptions.setTryTimeout(Duration tryTimeout)
      Sets the maximum duration to wait for completion of a single attempt, whether the initial attempt or a retry.
      Constructors in com.azure.core.amqp with parameters of type RetryOptions 
      Constructor and Description
      ExponentialRetryPolicy(RetryOptions retryOptions)
      Creates a new instance with a minimum and maximum retry period in addition to maximum number of retry attempts.
      FixedRetryPolicy(RetryOptions retryOptions)
      Creates an instance with the given retry options.
      RetryPolicy(RetryOptions retryOptions)
      Creates an instance with the given retry options.

    • Uses of RetryOptions in com.azure.messaging.eventhubs

      Methods in com.azure.messaging.eventhubs with parameters of type RetryOptions 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EventHubClientBuilder EventHubClientBuilder.retry(RetryOptions retryOptions)
      Sets the retry policy for EventHubAsyncClient.

    • Uses of RetryOptions in com.azure.messaging.eventhubs.models

      Methods in com.azure.messaging.eventhubs.models that return RetryOptions 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RetryOptions EventHubConsumerOptions.getRetry()
      Gets the retry options when receiving events.
      RetryOptions EventHubProducerOptions.getRetry()
      Gets the retry options used to govern retry attempts when an issue is encountered while sending.
      Methods in com.azure.messaging.eventhubs.models with parameters of type RetryOptions 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EventHubConsumerOptions EventHubConsumerOptions.setRetry(RetryOptions retry)
      Sets the retry policy used to govern retry attempts for receiving events.
      EventHubProducerOptions EventHubProducerOptions.setRetry(RetryOptions retry)
      Sets the retry options used to govern retry attempts when an issue is encountered while sending.
